scripts.build:functions: npm run clean:functions && next build && npm run prepare:functions && npm run copy:files && npm run install:deps
scripts.copy:files: mkdir -p .firebase/functions/.next && cp -r .next/standalone/* .firebase/functions && cp -r .next/static .firebase/functions/.next/static && cp .next/BUILD_ID .firebase/functions/.next/BUILD_ID && cp .next/*.json .firebase/functions/.next/ && cp -r .next/server .firebase/functions/.next/server && cp -r .next/types .firebase/functions/.next/types && cp -r public .firebase/functions/public && cp functions.package.json .firebase/functions/package.json && cp functions/index.js .firebase/functions/index.js
scripts.deploy:functions: npm run build:functions && firebase deploy --only functions
